TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HierarchicalDataBoundControlAdapter extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter

summary.span: 針對特定瀏覽器要求，自訂與這個控制項配置器關聯的 物件之行為。

span.span: Customizes the behavior of a object with which this control adapter is associated, for specific browser requests.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會適應相關聯控制項來修改預設標記或特定瀏覽器的行為。The class adapts the associated control to modify the default markup or behavior for a specific browser. 您可以延伸類別，以進一步自訂轉譯控制項。You can extend the class to further customize rendering of the control. A控制項繫結至資料來源，並產生其使用者介面 （或控制階層中，通常的子系），列舉會繫結至資料來源中的項目。A control is bound to a data source and generates its user interface (or child control hierarchy, typically), by enumerating the items in the data source to which it is bound. 如需有關階層式資料繫結控制項的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information on hierarchical data-bound controls, see . 控制項配接器是.net 元件，可在特定瀏覽器控制項的生命週期管理一個或多個階段。Control adapters are.NET components that manage one or more stages in the life cycle of a control for a specific browser. 擴充類別提供存取權的生命週期階段控制項。Extending the class provides access to the life-cycle stages of the control. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 架構概觀的自動調整控制項行為](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ff05ae9-4109-4352-929e-ad893895dbff(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Architectural Overview of Adaptive Control Behavior](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ff05ae9-4109-4352-929e-ad893895dbff(v=vs.100)). 配接器的初始要求會導致.NET Framework，才能搜尋控制項，為對應的介面卡的要求的瀏覽器的特性。The initial request for an adapter causes the .NET Framework to search for a mapped adapter for the control, given the characteristics of the requesting browser. 瀏覽器定義檔案由找出用戶端瀏覽器的特性，並對應至瀏覽器類型的配接器的類別。Browser definition files are used by the class to identify the characteristics of the client browser and map the adapter to the browser type. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何擴充類別呈現階層式繫結至控制項物件。The following code example shows how to extend the class to render a hierarchical control that is bound to an object. 此程式碼範例包含四個物件：This code example contains four objects: - 配接器會衍生自類別。An adapter derived from the class. - .Aspx 檔案，其中包含控制項和裝置特定內容。The .aspx file that incorporates the control and device-specific content. - 要連結的裝置類型的配接器的瀏覽器檔案。A browser file to link the adapter to a device type. - 包含階層式員工清單的 XML 檔案。An XML file that contains a hierarchical list of employees. 此程式碼範例是由四個程式碼區段所組成。This code example consists of four code segments. 第一個程式碼片段示範如何擴充類別。The first code segment demonstrates how to extend the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HierarchicalDataBoundControlAdapter#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HierarchicalDataBoundControlAdapter/CS/hierarchicaltreeviewadapter.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HierarchicalDataBoundControlAdapter#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HierarchicalDataBoundControlAdapter/VB/hierarchicaltreeviewadapter.vb#1)] 第二個程式碼片段示範如何宣告繫結至 XML 資料來源。The second code segment demonstrates how to declare a to bind to an XML data source. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HierarchicalDataBoundControlAdapter#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HierarchicalDataBoundControlAdapter/CS/implcs.aspx#4)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HierarchicalDataBoundControlAdapter#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HierarchicalDataBoundControlAdapter/VB/implvb.aspx#4)] 第三個程式碼片段示範如何連結Windows CE 上執行的瀏覽器的自訂配接器的控制項。The third code segment shows how to link the control to the custom adapter for browsers running on Windows CE. 最後的程式碼區段提供的 XML 資料，控制項繫結至。The final code segment provides the XML data that the control binds to.

related.span: 調整控制項行為的架構概觀

span.span: Architectural Overview of Adaptive Control Behavior

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 建構的執行個體類別。The .NET Framework constructs an instance of the class. 配接器的初始要求會導致.NET Framework，才能搜尋控制項要求的瀏覽器的特性對應配置器。The initial request for an adapter causes the .NET Framework to search for a mapped adapter for the control given the characteristics of the requesting browser. 控制項配接器發現之後，保留中的對應配接器執行個體的參考其屬性。After the adapter is found, the control holds a reference to the mapped adapter instance in its property.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected ReadOnly Property Control As HierarchicalDataBoundControl

summary.span: 擷取與這個 物件相關聯的 控制項的強型別參考。

span.span: Retrieves a strongly typed reference to the control associated with this object.

value.span: 與 目前執行個體關聯的 。

span.span: The associated with the current instance of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可存取對應的控制項，包括其屬性和方法。The property provides access to the corresponding control, including its properties and methods. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫屬性來擷取強型別控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to override the property to retrieve a strongly typed control. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HierarchicalDataBoundControlAdapter#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HierarchicalDataBoundControlAdapter/CS/hierarchicaltreeviewadapter.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HierarchicalDataBoundControlAdapter#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HierarchicalDataBoundControlAdapter/VB/hierarchicaltreeviewadapter.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void PerformDataBinding() cil managed
abstract member PerformDataBinding : unit -> unit override this.PerformDataBinding : unit -> unit

summary.span: 將關聯階層式資料繫結控制項資料來源中的資料繫結至配置器。

span.span: Binds the data in the data source of the associated hierarchical data-bound control to the adapter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法中指定的資料來源相關聯的資料繫結若要控制物件。The method binds the data in the specified data source of the associated control to the object. 您可以覆寫來取代標準資料繫結功能的相關聯控制項或提供額外的資料繫結功能，如果相關聯已擴充控制項。You can override to replace the standard data-binding functionality of the associated control or to provide additional data-binding functionality if the associated control has been extended. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法，確認屬性已設定之前呼叫父方法。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method to verify the property has been set prior to calling the parent method. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HierarchicalDataBoundControlAdapter#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HierarchicalDataBoundControlAdapter/CS/hierarchicaltreeviewadapter.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HierarchicalDataBoundControlAdapter#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HierarchicalDataBoundControlAdapter/VB/hierarchicaltreeviewadapter.vb#2)]
